content:
Why doe the publisher not render bundle of type "document" with composition not like Bundle of type "message" with messageheader.
examples: http://build.fhir.org/ig/ehealthsuisse/ch-vacd/Bundle-1-3-VaccinationRecord.html and http://build.fhir.org/ig/ehealthsuisse/ch-vacd/Bundle-1-4-ImmunizationRecommendationRequest.html
The renderer follows the specification which is explicit about how to render a document
